data.text: @camillalookalik @guernseyliz14 It’s taken a while but no real problems, just off colour.
@CorbetJanie @guernseyliz14 Hope you’re back to full strength.
@camillalookalik @guernseyliz14 That’s not good and I do appreciate that’s the issue   Hope he feels better soon.
@CorbetJanie @guernseyliz14 B in law in hospital x3 in 10 days now. Home but very weak. You just don’t know how it’s going to hit you. 🥴

@guernseyliz14 @camillalookalik I was poorly for a few days (flu-like symptoms). Had it been flu, it would not have been recorded and I think we’re going down the same path as far as Covid is concerned ...at least, I hope so.
@CorbetJanie @camillalookalik Some have been more poorly than others. Not hospital poorly but they have felt grim for several day.
@guernseyliz14 @camillalookalik I suppose it depends on how ill it’s made them.
@CorbetJanie @camillalookalik And it won't be good news judging from the number of people I know with it. Never known so many.
@camillalookalik Only once a week now on a Tuesday.
